_sText:
Hello

i was plaing cs_italy and i'd noticed i like that map so i decided to reedit it and make it more "useable"
you can enter almost all houses walk on some roofs etc. etc.
V2 Changelog:
Added new spots
Added secret places/tunnels
Added HDR *WARNING IF YOU HAVE EVERYTHING SHINY LIKE B**** type in console sv_cheats1 and mat_hdrenabled 0 reload map hdr will be on but not so shiny*
added some furniture *for realism*
repaired some bugs
Hope u like it!
v3 changelog
Added new places
99.9% roofs are at your disposition
new secrets
fixed some bugs
**READ**
walkable space etc. etc.(made for bots they are moving on them)-info nodes
theres too much to calculate and my comp can't do it (VALVe made it uncorrectly it doesnt take 100% CPU power) and if some1 of you have more than:
2GB RAM
2CORE AMD ATHLON x64 x2 dual core processor 4200+
please make NEW NAVIGATION MESH!
v.4 CHANGELOG
Repaired one BIG bug
working on hdr....
Final version changelog:
HDR WORKS CORRECTLY ON ALL COMPUTERS
FIXED ALL BUGS OF PREVIOUS VERSION
